name: battlecode
description: > BattleCode is a website where you compete against your friends in an epic code battle! ## This app brings the excitement of live competition to coding. > Have you been lacking in your code skills lately. Fear no more, for BattleCode is here to alleviate your pain. ## "My life has been changed by BattleCode...it's all I do!" ## Head on down to https://www.battlecode.com to get started! ## "Battlecode is the most fun I've had in my 70 years of teaching." ## If you want to be the best coder come join today!
author: marinamcgrath
